name: brackets-mybuilder
title: Brackets Mybuilder
description: One key to run programs contained in one file (can be used for Go, C, C++, C#, Scala, Java, Python, Ruby, Node, C++, PHP, Bash) from Brackets and display results in panel. It is possible to diy your own build systems via 'Edit > Script Builder Configuration' menu item and editing opened JSON file (you need to restart Brackets afterwards).
author: Sunrise <yane@88.com>
